title: How did someone make you feel special? - Quora

response.answer_text: My best friend once said to me 'I pray we can be together in heaven just like we are together here on earth.’ That was one of the sweetest things to have touched my heart.There was this one guy who made me feel special. There were male students walking in my direction including him. As he saw me entering through the door, he put his arm back as to stop the guys, so that I could pass through without feeling uncomfortable or even touched.I am used to guys gawking at me whenever I'm in public. My friends and I had just left a place of worship, and as we were about to turn corners, I made eye contact with a stranger. As soon as I met his eyes, he looked down as a means of respect. I don't know why but he made me feel valuable that day.In my college years, this guy had feelings for me. He couldn't express them to me but I could pick up the subtle signs he used to give me. He also used to look out for me. It was like in our entire year group, I was the only female he saw. It made me feel very special.There was another time when I was being mistreated by one of my teachers, he defended me behind my back. This wasn't the same guy as the one mentioned before this. He was supportive of me despite not knowing me well. My friends informed me of what was being said around the college. I respected him for that.Someone paid for my meal once at a local food shop. This didn't only make me feel special but it made me appreciate the good in people.I had a really tough time in my school days and this one teacher was the only person who often asked if I was okay. He was the only one that made me feel strong. The rest of the teachers saw me struggling and did nothing about it. Today, I know what type of teacher I want to be and it's all because of him.A child with visual impairment in my placement school hugged me tight and told me I was the best thing to have happened to her. I felt emotional but at the same time really touched.My mentor recommended me for an award. I didn't deserve it but winning that award made me feel special.

The pleasure of all that I am is you. In the words of tomorrow’s been I am caught in the heart of forever. Many think forever is a time, but the truth is it is a space where the essence of true love dwells. I dawn to you the shift of time’s night unfurling to breath forever on the place where my heart dwells. It is in you. Wherever the place in who you be is a space cored to where it is in you I am. Feel me hold you tonight as the pleasure of where you wish. It is to embellish from within this belong. Hold my hand, my love, as we travel together the in and out of where we reflect. The mirror of my heart is you and so as I breathe there to ever this I moment you forever as the one I love. The pleasure of all that I am is you.
